phrases: Why are you going through Reiko's belongings?
Like always, I just do not get you.
You have got some on you.
On the sides of your mouth.
Do not worry about them, they are just there.
When I return the names back to the Youkai,
Reiko-san's memories become my own thoughts,
It is a book borrowed from the library.
It looks like she forgot to return it, though.
Who do you think is wrong?
This guy says that he eats the kitsune first in kitsune udon!
Of course you should eat it first!
The kitsune must be put at the bottom of the soup and eaten last!
You should eat the kitsune before it absorbs the soup!
W-Well, I think that either way is fine.
The kitsune must be eaten later!
Well, before arguing any more, I do not think it should be called kitsune.
This is an old ticket, right?
What does it have to do with you?
It seems to have some kind of history.
I picked it up on my way to school this morning.
You are terrible at telling lies.
I am telling you, it is nothing.
I will ask for all the details later.
There is no point in running.
Ah, no, I was not running away.
You are going to the station on that ticket, are not you?
I could not see it well earlier, so I forgot.
Why do you want to go so much, Sasada?
After that test of courage the other day, I have wanted to see a real one up close!
Hey, look, the bus is here.
Come on, let us get on.
And what are you saying that I droppe-
This place is not being used anymore.
They say that it was abandoned quite a while ago.
I guess Kiriganuma is over there.
How can he sleep in this heat?
Hey, you have got it wrong!
It is pointless to say anything to him now.
He is not evil, so just play with him a bit.
He is her grandson, after all.
There is nothing strange about them having the same smell.
You do not need to smell me.
So, furball, you said you were waiting for Reiko.
Did you have a promise with her or something?
Yeah, she said she would go with me.
Reiko-san was supposed to go with you to Kiriganuma?
and said, I cannot forgive you!
And then Reiko said, No, and Later.
I guess it is impossible to have him explain.
He is probably in the Book of Friends.
If you return his name, I am sure the thoughts will explain it all.
One who would protect me, show your name.
Mikuri was the one who got angry, though.
And you like that Youkai Mikuri, do not you?
But Mikuri said that he hates me,
and that he does not want to see me again.
Then why is Mikuri so angry with you?
I sort of understand why Mikuri is angry now.
The place by the next station?
I will go with you, then.
The sun is already setting today,
so let us meet here again tomorrow.
But she could not keep her promise.
I am sure there was some reason why she could not come.
He might not be waiting anymore.
We will not know unless we go.
I want to do what Reiko-san left behind.
The sun is already setting, though.
I will come by after school tomorrow.
Okay, we will go right now.
You are an idiot, making promises without thinking things through.
There are not any buses that pass by Kiriganuma.
How long do you think it will take to walk there?
The sun will set by then for sure.
It looks like there is no point in persuading you.
If Reiko could not come, could not you have gone by yourself?
Why did you wait all this time?
I was an idiot to ask.
The mountain winds are coming down.
Well, these kinds of people can be seen as charming or annoying.
What are you going to say when you see Mikuri?
You have not thought about it?
If you want to make up, you have to say something.
Maybe it is better if they do not meet.
It might just be troublesome once he is back.
Think of something to say before we get there.
Mikuri seems to be possessed by the earth spirits.
They feed off of anger and hatred.
Did Mikuri hate Santo that much?
It would be safer if we do not go and see him.
What do you want to do, Natsume?
I do not care what happens, then.
It is almost like it is not even summer.
It is not the mountain winds.
It must be because of the malice.
Santo, what does Mikuri look like?
This is no time to be joking around.
What do you want to do, Natsume?
Who do you think I am?
You are Natsume Reiko, are not you?
Give me the Book of Friends.
I see, the Book of Friends is in there.
Give me the Book of Friends!
It is sad, but he disappeared along with the earth spirits to the bottom of the swamp.
Hey, what are you doing, you idiot!?
This is creepy, so let go!
You had a fight because of Reiko?
What do you mean by that?
He gave his precious name to Reiko.
That is why I got angry.
Do not you have any pride as an Ayakashi, you big fool?
I did not want to see your face again!
And then you just show up like it is nothing!
Hey, you do not have to say it like that.
He is been worrying about it the entire time because he likes you.
That is why he is an idiot!
If you are going to apologize, then get lost!
They already made up a long time ago.
Mikuri, let us go back to the mountains!
I would go back even if you did not tell me to, idiot!
Do not bow your head to a human!
I told you not to lower your head, you idiot!
Just putting it back to where it was.
You said Reiko could not keep her promise because she had some special reason, right?
You are giving her too much credit.
That is the kind of person she was.
It is there because she forgot to return it?
Ah, it looks like she forgot quite a few things.
She must have had some really special reasons.
Hey, have a look at that.
What was up with yesterday, then?
I just do not get it.
It must be because they are friends.
Sorry, take this for a second.
Do you eat the shrimp in tempura noodles first or last?
A village submerged by a dam shows itself.
The Youkai that live there come to have their names returned.
Do not hang on to Natsume!
There is someone I want to see.
I will be troubling you for a while.
